snippet.title: ASHEN | Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
Ashen is coming to Nintendo Switch, PS4, Steam, and GOG on December 9th. http://ashen-game.com

Steam: http://bit.ly/AshenGameSteam
GOG: https://bit.ly/AshenGameGOG
Switch: https://bit.ly/AshenGameSwitch
PS4: https://bit.ly/AshenGamePS4

Ashen is an action RPG about a wanderer in search of a place to call home. This is a world where nothing lasts, no matter how tightly you cling to it. At its core, Ashen is about forging relationships. Players can guide those they trust to their camp - together, you might just stand a chance. 

Developed by A44. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2019
